Title: Permits certain persons to leave behind opioid antagonists at the location of a known or suspected opioid overdose
Summary: Permits certain persons to leave behind opioid antagonists at the location of a known or suspected opioid overdose.
LawCode: Amd ยง3309, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to permitting certain persons to leave behind opioid antagonists at the location of a known or suspected opioid overdose
